original_text: She is happy to work with her own hands to make clothes with wool and linen.
korean_text: 그는 양털과 삼을 구하여 부지런히 손으로 일하며

sentences.original_text: She is happy to work with her own hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자신의 손으로 일하는 것을 기뻐합니다

sentences.original_text: to make clothes with wool and linen
